Package de.oth.blocklib.world.structures

Class Structure

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.world.structures.Structure
public abstract class Structure
extends java.lang.Object
Provides static functions for generating data needed to integrate structures into the world generation.
Author:
Chris Ebbinger (WS 2017/2018)

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Structure.Rotation
    Provides fixed rotation angles used to rotate structures counter-clockwise.

  • Method Details

    • initCustomStructures

      public static void initCustomStructures()
      Initializes Data that is needed for placement of custom Structures.

    • getStructureData

      public static java.util.Map<Vector3i,​java.lang.Short> getStructureData​(int chunkX, int chunkZ, int minChunkHeight)
      Calculates vectors and materials describing a structure. Chooses randomly between prewritten or procedurally generated structures.
      Parameters:
      chunkX - The starting X coordinate of the chunk containing the structure
      chunkZ - The starting Z coordinate of the chunk containing the structure
      minChunkHeight - The chunk's lowest terrain height level
      Returns:
      blockIDs mapped to position vectors describing the structure data

    • generateBuilding

      public static java.util.Map<Vector3i,​java.lang.Short> generateBuilding​(java.util.Random random, int minChunkHeight)
      Provides structure data calculated entirely using procedural generation
      Parameters:
      random - The random object used for generating procedural random values
      minChunkHeight - The chunk's lowest terrain height level
      Returns:
      blockIDs mapped to position vectors describing the building

    • getCustomStructure

      public static java.util.Map<Vector3i,​java.lang.Short> getCustomStructure​(java.util.Random random, int minChunkHeight)
      Provides structure data read from Blocklib Structure files generated by the blockitect tool. The structures are rotated and positioned procedrually.
      Parameters:
      random - The random object used for generating procedural random values
      minChunkHeight - The chunk's lowest terrain height level
      Returns:
      blockIDs mapped to position vectors describing the structure data
      See Also:
      initCustomStructures()

    • readCustomStructures

      public static java.util.List<java.util.Map<Vector3i,​java.lang.Short>> readCustomStructures​(java.lang.String structuresPath)
      Used to find and analyze structures stored in .bs files.
      Parameters:
      structuresPath - The parent directory of the structure files
      Returns:
      A list of structures stored as (Map<Vector3i, Short>)

    • readCustomStructures

      public static java.util.List<java.util.Map<Vector3i,​java.lang.Short>> readCustomStructures()
      Reads structures using the standard path specified in Configuration.
      Returns:
      A list of structures
      See Also:
      readCustomStructures(String)

    • parseStructureFromFile

      public static java.util.Map<Vector3i,​java.lang.Short> parseStructureFromFile​(java.lang.String path)
      Validates and parses Blocklib Structure files. Tries to parse as much data as possible and just skips invalid lines.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the structure file
      Returns:
      A structure stored as (Map<Vector3i, Short>)

    • getAllStructureFiles

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllStructureFiles​(java.io.File directory)
      Searches for .bs files within a directory.
      Parameters:
      directory - The directory containing the structure files
      Returns:
      a List of the paths of all .bs files

    • trim

      public static java.util.Map<Vector3i,​java.lang.Short> trim​(java.util.Map<Vector3i,​java.lang.Short> structureData, int baseHeight)
      Moves the sctructure as close as possible to (0, baseHeight, 0) inside the first Octant (+++).
      Parameters:
      structureData - the structure to be trimmed
      baseHeight - the ground height of the structure
      Returns:
      the same structure without padding

    • rotate

      public static java.util.Map<Vector3i,​java.lang.Short> rotate​(java.util.Map<Vector3i,​java.lang.Short> structureData, Structure.Rotation rotation)
      Rotates a structure by a multiple of 90.
      Parameters:
      structureData - the structure to be rotated
      rotation - the angle to rotate the structure by
      Returns:
      the rotated structure

    • positionInChunk

      public static java.util.Map<Vector3i,​java.lang.Short> positionInChunk​(java.util.Random random, java.util.Map<Vector3i,​java.lang.Short> structureData, int baseHeight)

      public static Vector3i getMin​(java.util.Map<Vector3i,​java.lang.Short> structureData)

      public static Vector3i getMax​(java.util.Map<Vector3i,​java.lang.Short> structureData)

    • copy

      public static java.util.Map<Vector3i,​java.lang.Short> copy​(java.util.Map<Vector3i,​java.lang.Short> originalStructure)
      Creates a full (deep) copy of a structure
      Parameters:
      originalStructure - The structure to be copied
      Returns:
      a deep copy of the given structure

    • seededMappedInt

      static int seededMappedInt​(java.util.Random random, int min, int max)
      Returns a pseudo random value between min and max (including the bounds).
      Parameters:
      random - The random object used for generating procedural random values
      min - smallest random value
      max - largest random value
      Returns:
      pseudo random value ranging from min to max
